summary: ICP dapp scaffold with Motoko backend and React + Vite + Tailwind frontend (shadcn/ui + Internet Identity hooks), currently being used to build a Gujarati marketing/landing page for “Magical AC Service” (Ahmedabad/Gandhinagar) including hero, services, service-areas/coverage, booking CTA via WhatsApp/call, and an Our Work/gallery section with ongoing content/layout iterations.

existing_features.title: Motoko backend canister scaffold
existing_features.description: Initial Motoko backend canister structure and build configuration for ICP deployment.

existing_features.title: React + Vite + Tailwind frontend scaffold
existing_features.description: Frontend application bootstrapped with React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and project configuration files.

existing_features.title: shadcn/ui component library integrated
existing_features.description: shadcn/ui component set added to the frontend (multiple UI primitives) with supporting config.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication hooks
existing_features.description: Frontend hooks and utilities for Internet Identity authentication (e.g., actor setup and II provider checks).

existing_features.title: Frontend-backend actor/declarations wiring
existing_features.description: Generated/added backend DID declarations and TypeScript actor wiring to call the backend from the frontend.

existing_features.title: Storage client utility for frontend persistence
existing_features.description: Utility module for managing storage/persistence concerns from the frontend.

existing_features.title: Initial UI section: Service Areas component
existing_features.description: Initial app UI includes a ServiceAreasSection component as part of the React app composition.

existing_features.title: Build/deploy template and scripts for ICP
existing_features.description: Added build-template assets (Dockerfile, deploy.sh, icp.yaml, workspace config, image scripts) to standardize building and deployment.

existing_features.title: Initial landing page UI (multi-section) with WhatsApp CTA
existing_features.description: Added a composed LandingPage with multiple sections/components (LandingNav, HeroSection, ServicesSection, CoverageSection, BookingSection, LandingFooter) and a FloatingWhatsAppButton CTA, integrated into the main App.

existing_features.title: Enhanced build-template frontend tooling and UI primitives
existing_features.description: Build-template updated with a broader set of shadcn/ui primitives, custom ESLint rules (e.g., Internet Identity provider requirement, no BigInt in query keys), and supporting scripts/utilities for standardized frontend builds.

existing_features.title: GitHub export / ICP CLI-friendly build support
existing_features.description: Project/build-template updated with additional build metadata and scripts (e.g., build.sh, build-request/spec artifacts) to support standardized exports and ICP CLI-friendly build/deploy workflows.

existing_features.title: Landing page section: Our Work component
existing_features.description: Added an OurWorkSection component to the landing page section set to showcase previous work/examples as part of the LandingPage composition.

existing_features.title: Update the landing page Services section component (frontend/src/components/landing/ServicesSection.tsx) to match the provided 4-card grid layout and styling: white section background, centered underlined section heading, and four cards using a light-blue background, rounded corners, bottom border accent, and shadow.

Ensure the Services section uses English user-facing text while preserving the service titles and translating the Gujarati descriptions into English for the four services: Jet Wash Service, Expert Repairing, Gas Refilling, and Installation.

Replace the icon implementation in the Services section to avoid Font Awesome dependency while still showing the four intended icons (snowflake, tools, gas pump, box/open package) with similar size and blue color as the provided snippet.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update/replace the Services section UI with the provided Gujarati “અમારી સ્પેશિયલ એસી સર્વિસ” 4-card layout (Jet Wash / Expert Repairing / Gas Refilling / Installation) and styling.

architectural_notes: Frontend uses React + Vite + Tailwind with shadcn/ui component primitives.
Authentication is handled via Internet Identity with frontend hooks to create/use an authenticated actor.
Backend is a Motoko canister with TypeScript declarations generated/checked into the frontend for integration.
Project includes a reusable build-template (Docker/build scripts/config) to standardize ICP builds/deploys.
Initial app now includes a composed landing page built from dedicated section components (nav/hero/services/coverage/booking/footer) plus a floating WhatsApp CTA.
Build-template frontend includes custom ESLint rules to enforce Internet Identity integration patterns and prevent problematic query-key usage (e.g., BigInt).
Build-template includes standardized image/tooling scripts (e.g., resize/prune) as part of the reusable build pipeline.
Build system now includes additional build/export metadata and scripts (e.g., build.sh and build-request/spec artifacts) to support ICP CLI/GitHub export workflows.
Landing page now includes an additional OurWorkSection component as part of the composed marketing/landing UI.
